Title: Relates to requiring trauma-informed forensic examination training for medical professionals
Summary: Requires trauma-informed forensic examination training for certain medical professionals on how to conduct a trauma-informed sexual assault forensic examination.
LawCode: Add ยง6508-a, Ed L; amd ยง2805-k, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public health law, in relation to requiring trauma-informed forensic examination training for certain medical professionals
